issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Hive Expression parsing is significantly slow for pre-fix expression than post-fix expressions

comments.body:
Adding the data in table format so that it's easy to understand the difference


||Expression size||pre-fix parse time||post-fix parse time||
|0|3|2|
|1|5|3|
|2|5|3|
|3|6|11|
|4|11|7|
|5|17|6|
|6|40|6|
|7|55|10|
|8|51|5|
|9|18|6|
|10|56|4|
|11|54|5|
|12|111|5|
|13|266|9|
|14|341|4|
|15|543|4|
|16|259|2|
|17|273|2|
|18|369|3|
|19|844|2|
|20|841|3|
|21|1545|1|
|22|1882|1|
|23|2533|2|
|24|4516|2|
|25|6837|1|
|26|12679|2|
|27|21823|2|
|28|33731|1|
|29|73989|3|
|30|118986|3|

If interested, it's plotted [here|http://fooplot.com/#-]. Will need to zoom-in to see the magnitude of difference.
